I visited for my implant treatment, the treatment was top notch, i am eating well after treatment. 
Doctors r well experienced n polite, the staff is also very cooperative. 
I definitely recommend fdc to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Recommend the doctors n team, staff. Good place n good job. Hygiene is well maintained, perfect to the T the job n costing is reasonable. Highly skilled n experienced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: So I was waiting to write this review from a long time. Now that my treatment is over I just want to say one thing that Dr. Abhinav Diwan is the best doctor I have ever met. He is extremely kind and caring and is a perfectionist in his work. Mine was a complicated case with multiple tooth extractions, root canals and advanced periodontal disease and severe crowding of teeth.  Sir explained me the entire treatment procedure in detail. Initially I was extremely anxious and scared to start the treatment. But Sir calmed my nerves and eased my anxiety at every step. Treatment was mostly painless. Sir would answer all my queries with great patience. He motivated me at every step and the final results are extremely satisfactory. I have had complete smile makeover and my gums are much  healthier than before. Infact the entire team of Family dental care clinic is extremely supportive. Thankyou Abhinav Sir. I wouldn't have thought of such an extensive treatment if it weren't you. Thanks Dr Kishore and the entire staff. I would recommend Family dental care clinic to everyone.üëçüëçüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Abhinav is extremely cooperative & honest with his profession. *** **** ****** **** ******** **** ****
Here is my experience  :

I was suffering from pain in my wisdom tooth; Pain was so severe that I wasn‚Äôt even able to open my mouth. I called up Dr Abhinav on a busy Saturday at 9 AM , Looking at the exigency he arranged for an appointment at 10.15 AM ,His Staff Arranged a surgeon by 11.30 AM & Surgeon extracted the tooth by 12.45 PM ( It was a complicated case but they did a great Job )
 Dr Abhinav follows up with his patients, Charges at the clinic are really reasonable.  Dr Abhinav explains everything very patiently & always listens to his patients, He will give a reasonable & honest opinion (it is Up to you whether you opt for it or not, No Obligations).
I would recommend this clinic , Thanks for being so honest with your profession

review: Immense experience all the doctors have here. Took no more than 20 mins to remove my wisdom tooth. Step by step, explanation on what, needs to be done and step by step explanation of what had been done. Very friendly environment and all needed products can be purchased here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting family dental care from long time now. My family n everyone respects Dr Abhinav Diwan & Dr Archana Diwan. They have been our family doctors from 2002. I can blindly trust them & feel comfortable with them. I surely recommend them for any kind of dental issues. They are good, patient, reasonable, and more importantly very good human beings. God bless them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Got my braces fixed as adviced by Dr. Abhinav and Dr. Kishore. Both the doctors are very humble and extremely good at their job. 
Dr. Kishore did the tooth extraction with very much care and concern and made sure that I went through as  minimal pain as possible. Also frequent follow ups by them to make sure everything was alright after the procedure. 
Very happy with the way the whole procedure was carried out.
Would definitely recommend Family Dental Care!
